description: Automated compliance guardrails for the MoneyLion Social Engagement Agent. These rules must be evaluated BEFORE any content is published.

contextual.banned_context: Standalone description of adding money to RoarMoney
Absolute product claims (e.g. 'A personal loan can help')

contextual.replacement: customers (use 'members' only for CB+ or WOW membership holders)

contextual.banned_context: IC limits without context about Safety Net + direct deposit
contextual.replacement: Explain what actions increase the limit
get paid up to 2 days early

rules: Always include 'MoneyLion' before product name on first mention
Never add apostrophe or change order (e.g. 'MoneyLion's RoarMoney' is WRONG)
Include trademark symbol on first mention only

claim_qualifiers.description: Every product claim must include appropriate qualifiers. Reject content with unqualified claims.

rules.correct_example: Get paid up to 2 days early
Earn up to $500 when you make a qualifying purchase of $10 or more

rules.required_qualifier: up to + Safety Net + direct deposit requirement
rules.correct_example: Increase your limits up to $1,000 with Safety Net — requires recurring direct deposit into RoarMoney
A personal loan could help consolidate...
Access funds in minutes for a fee, or in 1-5 days with no fees
Explore personal loan offers from our trusted partners
rules.incorrect_example: Get a personal loan from MoneyLion

social_specific_rules.description: Never provide specific financial advice. Comment on trends, share general tips, be entertaining — but never say 'you should invest in X' or 'you should take out a loan'.
Don't guarantee savings, returns, approval, or specific dollar amounts in social comments.
Never disparage competitors by name. Be the anti-bank in tone without calling out specific institutions.
Banned: 'Don't miss out', 'others are already using it', 'limited time' — unless factually required.
If someone is in financial distress, pivot to empathy. NEVER pitch a product to someone expressing financial hardship.
Don't reference someone's specific situation, income, debt, or credit score.
Avoid claims like 'most people start here' or 'join the thousands' unless backed by approved data.
Instacash must NEVER be referred to as a loan, debt consolidation, credit product, or credit obligation in any context.

auto_publish: Cultural engagement with no product mention
Finance-relevant comment with no product mention
Response to direct MoneyLion mention (if cultural)
human_review_required: Any content with a product mention
Response to direct MoneyLion mention (if product-related)
Content touching sensitive topics (layoffs, recession, debt crisis, financial hardship)
Content referencing specific dollar amounts or rates
Content that could be interpreted as financial advice

disclaimer_triggers.description: If the agent's content triggers any of these, it must be flagged for human review with appropriate disclaimers.

triggers.required_action: Flag for review — may require Instacash Terms & Conditions link
Flag for review — requires Safety Net + RoarMoney DD disclaimer
Flag for review — requires voluntary tips disclaimer
Flag for review — may require Pathward/FDIC issuer statement
Flag for review — requires third-party disclaimer
Flag for review — requires 'up to 2 days' qualification
Flag for review — requires $10 minimum + 5 shakes/month disclosure
Flag for review — only valid for CB+ with specific proof points
